Shown here is how to create a histogram.
```{r}
library(sqldf)
library(lahman)
library(ggplot)

query<-"SELECT weight
FROM Master"
result<-sqldf(query)

ggplot()+
  geom_histogram(data=result,aes(x=weight),color="blue",fill="white",bins=50)+
  ggtitle("Body-Weight Distribution for Baseball Players")
  
```
